name: Environaut\Checks\ComposerSecurityCheck
short_desc: The SensioLabs Security Checker is a command line tool that checks if your application uses dependencies with known security vulnerabilities.
long_desc:
It uses the SensioLabs Security
Check Web service and the Security Advisories Database behind the scenes.

getDefaultGroupName.name: getDefaultGroupName
getDefaultGroupName.short_desc: Returns the default group name this check uses when none is specified.
getDefaultGroupName.hint_desc: default group name of the check

run.name: run
run.short_desc: Execute the check and add messages and settings to the result.
run.hint_desc: true if check succeeded; false otherwise
